title: "Skip waiting for stats" after every game, and always disconnecting from game wait que
body:
I have been having the "Skip waiting for stats" thing come up after games for over a year now. it tends to happen 6-8 times out of every 10 games, but i just put up with it. 

Now over the past 2-3 weeks it has gotten much worse for me. I never get to see start after a game 90% of the time, which really bothers me. 

Even worse is that I am often waiting in que with friends for a game. They will get a game and I wont get the game. I am not disconnected thought because I can still chat, look at the store, and browse my leagues and match history like normal. 

My internet is really good, I share with 1 person, and it is much more then enough. I live in Chicago, so my ping is usually 17 and  I never have lag or disconnects in game. It just happens before and after almost every game now, and it is quite frustrating.

I have been looking up for a while how to fix this but no one seems to have the same problem as me, if anyone knows or a Riot employee could attempt to help me, that would really mean a lot. I didn't want to come to the forums, but I can't find anything on my issue.

replies.body: Bump, it's still shit. Fix it already. I've sent like... 100 bug reports, and still nothing. Please be useful! :)
Bump, I have the same issue here.

Entering champion selects pulls every player into the server as a group.  It sounds like a connection issue with your network is causing you to be left behind upon accepting the match.

Additionally, waiting for the game stats to load can also be due to an unstable connection.

For these specific issues, I recommend going over our [Troubleshoot Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) issue to get this fixed up.

I have the same problem with the "skip waiting for stats" part. Sometimes I don't get the notification when a game starts too.

Wish I could help
